message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product. I think you'll really love it! I'm willing to let it go for $150.
I'm really interested in the product, but $150 is a bit out of my budget. I'd be willing to pay $100 for it.
I understand that $100 is a bit low for me, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm now offering the product for $125. It's a great deal, and I think you'll really appreciate it!
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but $125 is still a bit too high for me. I'd be willing to pay $110 for it.

I'm getting closer to your price, but I still need to make a profit. I'm now offering the product for $120, which is the minimum I'm willing to accept. It's a fair price, and I think you'll be happy with it.
I appreciate your flexibility, but I'm still not sure about $120. I'd be willing to pay $115 for it.
I'm not willing to go any lower than $120, but I'm willing to meet you at $118. I think that's a fair compromise, and I'm confident you'll love the product.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me at $118, but I'm still a bit short on budget. I'd be willing to pay $115 for it.

I'm not going to go any lower than $120, and I think it's time for you to make a decision. I'm willing to hold out for the price I want, but I'm not going to keep negotiating forever. I'm sticking with $120.
